name: MooshroomEntityHelper
description: The MooshroomEntityHelper class provides specialized access to Mooshroom entities in Minecraft, offering methods for shearing mechanics, variant identification, and mooshroom-specific behaviors.
overview:
The MooshroomEntityHelper class provides specialized access to Mooshroom entities in Minecraft, offering methods for shearing mechanics, variant identification, and mooshroom-specific behaviors. This class extends AnimalEntityHelper, inheriting comprehensive functionality for animal breeding, feeding behaviors, and mob management while adding mooshroom-specific features like variant checking and shearing capabilities.

This helper is essential for scripts that manage mooshroom farms, automate mushroom collection, handle mooshroom breeding, or any functionality that requires interaction with Minecraft's unique mooshroom entities that combine cow behaviors with mushroom-related mechanics.

methods.name: isShearable
methods.description: Checks if the mooshroom is ready to be sheared. If true, shearing the entity will transform it into a cow and drop 5 mushrooms of the corresponding variant type.

methods.name: isRed
methods.description: Checks if the mooshroom is of the red variant. Red mooshrooms drop red mushrooms when sheared.

methods.name: isBrown
methods.description: Checks if the mooshroom is of the brown variant. Brown mooshrooms drop brown mushrooms when sheared.
